pages.text: 76|26|yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta.
76|27|Zhe deng ren dique shi aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri
76|28|wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen.
76|29|Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu.
76|30|Chu an la yiyu wai, nimen jue bu yiyu. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
76|31|Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de ren, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
77|1|Shi yi feng pai chuanda jiayin,
77|2|sui menglie chui dong zhe,
77|3|shi yi chuanbo ge wu,
77|4|er shi zhi fensan,
77|5|nai chuanshou jiaoxun zhe,
77|6|shi yi shi yuanliang huo jinggao zhe,
77|7|jinggao nimen de shi, shi biding fasheng de.
77|8|Dang xingsu andan de shihou,
77|9|dangtian ti polie de shihou,
77|10|dang shanluan feiyang de shihou,
77|11|dangzhong shizhe bei dingqi zhaoji de shihou,
77|12|qixian zai na ri ne?
77|13|Zai panjue zhi ri.
77|14|Ni zen neng zhidao panjue zhi ri, shi shenme?
77|15|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|16|Nandao wo meiyou huimie xian min ma?
77|17|Ranhou, wo shi hou min sui tamen er xiaomie.
77|18|Wo jiang zheyang chuzhi fanzui de ren.
77|19|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
